Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
To provide you with some further help in accessing the benefits of {!Opportunity.Product__c}, Order # {!Opportunity.User_Order_ID__c}, below are some simple instructions:
Business Advantage Pro Please click here and enter your email address & password under Existing Member. Choose the Business Advantage tab, where you will be able to schedule consultations with Attorneys and Tax Professionals. You can also access the legal form library by clicking on Downloadable Legal Forms.
Legal Advantage Plus Please click here and enter your email address & password under Existing Member. Choose the Legal Advantage tab, where you will be able to schedule consultations with Attorneys and Tax Professionals. You can also access the legal form library by clicking on Downloadable Legal Forms.
Compliance Calendar Please click here and enter your email address & password under Existing Member. Choose the Corporate Center tab, where you will be able to access information regarding your upcoming business requirements.
Minutes Manager Please click here and enter your email address & password under Existing Member. Click on the link under the Orders Completed tab of your My Account page, where you will be able to enter the necessary information to complete your meeting minutes.
Registered Agent Please click here and enter your email address & password under Existing Member. Choose the Corporate Center tab, where you will be able to access information regarding your upcoming business requirements. By clicking on the Service of Process you can view the correspondence received related to your business.
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom.com for your legal needs.
Best regards,
